law.catch_line: In this section, "minority business enterprise" has the meaning stated in Title 14, Subtitle 3 of th...

text.section: In this section, "minority business enterprise" has the meaning stated in Title 14, Subtitle 3 of this article.

Each unit of the State government that leases State-owned property to business entities shall adopt regulations that establish procedures for awarding the leases. The procedures shall be structured to try to achieve participation by minority business enterprises in:
10% of the total dollar amount of the leases; and
10% of the total number of leases.
